member_organisations: Link to the webpage containing a list of our members: https://eupha.org/eupha-members
fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Regional Policy, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives:
- Monitoring policy making process within the EU health institutions 
- Circulating information on public health policy developments amongst stakeholders: researchers, policy makers, national public health associations, practitioners 
- Participating in policy debates and stakeholder dialogues to raise the profile of public health in all policy areas 
- Supporting collaboration and partnerships between NGOs and other organisations active at European, national and local public health.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Member of:  
European Commission's Health Policy Platform 
World Federation of Public Health Associations 
WHO World Health Forum 
 
Associated member / Board member of: 
ASPHER - Association of Schools of Public Health in the European Region 
APHEA - Agency for Public Health Education and Accreditation 
EPHA - European Public Health Alliance 
EuroHealthNet 
International Union for Health Promotion and Education - IUPHE 
European Healthcare Management Association - EHMA 
European Association for Communication in Healthcare - EACH 
European Society for Quality in Healthcare - ESQH 
European Association for Dental Public Health - EADPH 
European Forum for Primary Care - EFPC
goals__remit: EUPHA's mission is to build capacity and knowledge in the field of public health, and to support practice and policy decisions through scientific evidence and producing and sharing knowledge with our members and partners in Europe.
relevant_communication:
Member of EU Expert Panel on Investing in Health 
Member of Health Policy Platform 
Participating in EU funded projects, both Horizon 2020 and DG SANTE: TO-REACH, GenCAD, PRECeDI
